```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
library(usethis) #git integration
library(here) #directory checks
library(tibble)
library(ggpubr) #ggarrange() figure wraps
theme_set(theme_classic())
```

```{r}
here()
```

```{r}
adults <- read.csv("AdultData_OffBase.csv", h=TRUE)
as_tibble(adults)
colnames(adults)
```

```{r}
sppWeight <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=weight))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppTEC <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=tec))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppWing <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=wingChord))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1) 

sppTail <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=tailLength))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppBillNT <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=billNT))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppBillW <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=billWidth))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppBillD <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=billDepth))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppHead <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=head))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

ggarrange(sppWeight,sppTEC,sppWing,sppTail,sppBillNT,sppBillW,sppBillW,sppHead)

```
